proposal: Hey Bull Moon community! 🌕 Noticed you're gearing up for the Bitcoin Halving in 2024 - that's a smart lookout. With 99 holders on the ETH network, you're clearly on a bullish path. Why not amplify this momentum? Consider deploying your own DEX or engaging the community with a lottery - all while sharing in the revenue. Let's make the countdown to 2024 even more rewarding! 🚀🎰
